name: Darkborn
description:
Darkborn (formerly "Project Wight") is a RPG created by the developer-team "The Outsiders" from Sweden. Influenced by monster movies, surrealist poetry, heavy metal album covers and many pop cultural and mythical aspects, the team is working on quite a different kind of Role Playing game. This time, the player is not the mighty knight or just another hero, but the creature itself, which has to survive in a fictional world with Viking elements, that has almost eradicated most of it's kind.

At moment, the release date of "Darkborn" still is unclear and will be announced in the future. System requirements are also unknown to this date.
